description: This source file implements functions related to Wi-Fi radio diagnostics statistics, including argument validation, key generation for statistics, executing radio diagnostic API calls, and copying cached statistics data. It interacts with radio traffic stats, manages memory for statistics data structures, and constructs identifiers used for diagnostic data collection.

methods.name: int validate_radio_diagnostic_args(wifi_mon_stats_args_t * args)
methods.description: Validates the input arguments for radio diagnostics, checking for NULL pointers and valid radio index.

methods.name: int generate_radio_diagnostic_clctr_stats_key(wifi_mon_stats_args_t * args,char * key_str,size_t key_len)
methods.description: Generates a unique key string for radio diagnostic collector stats based on statistics type and radio index.

methods.name: int generate_radio_diagnostic_provider_stats_key(wifi_mon_stats_config_t * config,char * key_str,size_t key_len)
methods.description: Generates a key string for provider-specific radio diagnostics, including configuration parameters.

methods.name: int execute_radio_diagnostic_stats_api(wifi_mon_stats_args_t * args,wifi_monitor_t * mon_data,unsigned long task_interval_ms)
methods.description: Performs the main operation of collecting radio traffic statistics, populating data structures, and handling memory allocation, with conditional HAL interaction.

methods.name: int copy_radio_diagnostic_stats_from_cache(wifi_mon_stats_args_t * args,void ** stats,unsigned int * stat_array_size,wifi_monitor_t * mon_cache)
methods.description: Copies cached radio statistics data into a new allocated structure for further processing or transmission.
